headline: Is It Too Late To Consider D.R. Horton After Its Multi Year Share Price Rally?
summary: Wondering if D.R. Horton is still a smart buy at these levels, or if the big gains are already behind it? You are not alone, and that is exactly what this breakdown will dig into. The stock has pulled back about 5.9% over the last week but is still up 7.0% over the past month, with a solid 69.9% gain over three years and a hefty 115.3% over five years, which hints at a long run of strong sentiment. Recently, investors have been focused on ongoing strength in US housing demand, cooling...
